1509410.name: Press Any Button - Mini Art Book
1509410.description:
If you like the game Press Any Button and wish to support the developer, you can do that by purchasing this DLC.

Press Any Button - Mini Art Book gives you access to a few beautiful digital illustrations.

What You Will Get:
  • 5 digital artworks big enough to use as wallpapers for your mobile phone or desktop screen.
  • Concept arts showing the work in progress.
  • More of Professor Avia Antseva - since she is only mentioned in the game, you might wonder what she actually looks like.
  • A big warm thank you from the creator of this game.

As a matter of fact, the creator of this game wants to thank you for playing it irregardless of whether you feel like buying this DLC or not.

He can only hope that you liked it.

Access:
This DLC will be automatically downloaded to the game folder (the file you need is Press_Any_Button.zip). If you don't know where to find that folder, you should do the following:
1. Open game library.
2. Right click on Press Any Button.
3. From the drop down list, select Properties.
4. Go to Local Files.
5. Push the Browse button.
1509410.supported_languages: 英语, 俄语, 乌克兰语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙
